name: Sunset Beach Bar
description: Beautiful beachside bar with stunning ocean views and live music on weekends. Perfect for watching the sunset while enjoying tropical cocktails.
comment: Great sunset views, reservations recommended on weekends

name: Mountain Peak Cafe
description: Cozy mountain retreat with fireplace, serving fresh pastries and locally roasted coffee. Popular spot for hikers and nature lovers.

name: Downtown Art Gallery
description: Contemporary art gallery featuring local and international artists. Rotating exhibitions every month with opening night events.
comment: Check their website for current exhibitions

name: Riverside Park
description: Scenic park along the river with walking trails, picnic areas, and playground. Great for families and outdoor activities.

name: Historic Library
description: Beautiful historic library building with extensive collection and quiet reading rooms. Free public access with membership.

name: Organic Market
description: Weekly farmers market featuring organic produce, artisanal foods, and handmade crafts. Open Saturday mornings.
comment: Cash and card accepted, arrive early for best selection

name: Yoga Wellness Center
description: Full-service wellness center offering yoga classes, meditation sessions, and spa treatments. Beginners welcome.
comment: First class free for new members

name: Jazz Music Club
description: Intimate jazz club with nightly live performances. Full bar and small plates menu available.
comment: Cover charge on weekends, make reservations

name: Tech Innovation Hub
description: Co-working space and innovation hub for startups and freelancers. High-speed internet and meeting rooms available.

name: Botanical Gardens
description: Expansive botanical gardens with themed sections including tropical plants, rose garden, and Japanese garden. Educational tours available.
comment: Guided tours on weekends, photography allowed
